mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R, C.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM BB_COMMENT WHERE BOOKNUM = #{bookNum} ORDER BY NUM DESC) C) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{lastRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BB_COMMENT (NUM, BOOKNUM, WRITER, CONTENTS, REGDATE) VALUES (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{bookNum},#{writer},#{contents},SYSDATE)
